full_text: Skill Level: Intermediate Sizes: Size / To fit chest measurement / Finished chest XS/S / 28-34” [71-86.5 cm] / 40” [101.5 cm] M / 36-38” [91.5-96.5 cm] / 44” [112 cm] L / 40-42” [101.5-106.5 cm] / 48” [122 cm] XL / 44-46” [112-117 cm] / 50” [127 cm] 2/3XL / 48-54” [122-137 cm] / 58” [147.5 cm] 4/5XL / 56-62” [142-157.5 cm] / 64” [162.5 cm] Materials: Bernat® Roving (100 g/3.5 oz; 109 m/120 yds) XS/S, M, L, XL, 2/3XL, 4/5XL Her Version: Main Color (MC): Rice Paper (00100) 4, 4, 5, 5, 5, 6 balls Contrast A: Cork (00021) 4, 4, 5, 5, 5, 6 balls Contrast B: Bark (00011) 2, 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 balls His Version: Main Color (MC): Rice Paper (00100) 4, 4, 5, 5, 5, 6 balls Contrast A: Putty (00032) 4, 4, 5, 5, 5, 6 balls Contrast B: Flint (00033) 2, 2, 2, 2, 3, 3 balls Additional Materials: 3 stitch holders Separating zipper See also: His and Hers Thunderbird Hat
